text: Fernando Fantoni (born 24 June 1964) is a Brazilian rower. He competed in the men's coxless four event at the 1988 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Brazil Category:Rowers at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Fernando Fantoni
